oai_dc:dc.dc:title: R\'enyi Entropy for the $\sun1$ WZW model on the torus
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schnitzer, Howard J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
Condensed Matter - Statistical Mechanics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The $\sun1$ WZW model is constructed on a n-sheeted branched torus, which allows the investigation of the R\'enyi entropy for a single interval at finite temperature. The small and large interval limits, as well as the low temperature expansion are presented for this theory.
Comment: v4. Typos corrected, remark added
